mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_MAIL_BOX SET STATUS = 'EMSTS005', SKEY = #{SKEY} WHERE 1 = 1 AND STATUS IN ('EMSTS001', 'EMSTS002') LIMIT 10

mapper.select: SELECT A.MAIL_BOX_SEQ, A.TITLE, A.CONTEXT, A.SEND_NAME, A.SEND_EMAIL, A.RECV_EMAIL, A.CC_EMAIL, A.HCC_EMAIL, A.GFILE_SEQ, A.MAIL_TYPE, A.REF_KEY FROM TBL_MAIL_BOX A WHERE 1 = 1 AND SKEY = #{SKEY} AND STATUS = 'EMSTS005'
